body:
After double-clicking on a card to remove it from a deck, or using the 'Remove Card' button, the highlight bar then selects the top card of the deck.

This can be quite frustrating when removing many cards from a deck.

The selected card also changes when adding cards, though doesn't feel as much of an issue.
author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)
title: Card Selection with Deck Editor
